tools.name: open_file
tools.description: Open a markdown (.md) or rndm (.rndm) file for editing. The file becomes the active document for all subsequent operations.

path.description: Path to the markdown file to open

tools.name: read_document
tools.description: Read the full content of the currently open document. Returns the raw markdown text.

tools.name: write_document
tools.description: Save the current document to disk. Optionally specify a different path to save-as.

path.description: File path to save to (defaults to the current file path)

tools.name: list_headings
tools.description: List all markdown headings (H1-H6) in the current document with their line numbers and levels.

tools.name: edit_section
tools.description: Replace the content of a markdown section (identified by heading). The heading line is preserved; only the body content between this heading and the next heading of equal or higher level is replaced.

heading.description: The heading text to find (case-insensitive, without # prefix)

content.description: New content for the section body

tools.name: insert_text
tools.description: Insert text at a specific line number or at the end of the document.

line.description: Line number to insert before (1-indexed). Omit to append at end.

tools.name: delete_lines
tools.description: Delete one or more lines from the document.

end_line.description: Last line to delete (1-indexed, inclusive). Defaults to start_line.

tools.name: search_content
tools.description: Search the document for lines matching a query (case-insensitive substring match). Returns matching lines with line numbers.

tools.name: get_structure
tools.description: Get document metadata and structural overview including line count, byte size, file path, modification status, and a hierarchical outline of all headings.
